publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4422 Chris Ballance: Nuclear Power Stations in Scotland—That the Parliament opposes the construction of any new nuclear power stations in Scotland.

S2M-4422 Chris Ballance: Nuclear Power Stations in Scotland—That the Parliament opposes the construction of any new nuclear power stations in Scotland. Supported by: Shiona Baird*, Campbell Martin*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Colin Fox*
S2M-4422 Nuclear Power Stations in Scotland (lodged on 18 May 2006) Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Robin Harper*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-4422 Nuclear Power Stations in Scotland (lodged on 18 May 2006) Patrick Harvie*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Eleanor Scott*, Carolyn Leckie*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4422 Nuclear Power Stations in Scotland (lodged on 18 May 2006) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr John Swinney*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-4422 Nuclear Power Stations in Scotland (lodged on 18 May 2006) Linda Fabiani*, Richard Lochhead*, Dr Jean Turner*, Frances Curran*
S2M-4422 Nuclear Power Stations in Scotland (lodged on 18 May 2006) Rosie Kane*
